sentences: See maja ehitati suureks ja mugavaks.
context: The Estonian word 'suureks' is the illative case (directional into) singular form of the adjective 'suur', meaning big or large. It indicates movement into a bigger state, size, or condition. In English translations, it would typically correspond to expressions like 'into something big', 'to become big', or simply 'big' depending on context.
